mapper.select: SELECT menu.id,menu.name,sales_volume,large_price,medium_price,small_price,discount,discount_price,introduction,sort, menu_image.id AS menuimage_id,url,menu_image.name AS menuimage_name FROM menu LEFT JOIN menu_image ON menu_image.menu_id=menu.id WHERE classification_id=#{classificationId} ORDER BY sort
mapper.update: update menu set name=#{name}, classification_id=#{classification.id}, large_price=#{largePrice}, medium_price=#{mediumPrice}, small_price=#{smallPrice}, sales_volume=#{salesVolume}, discount=#{discount}, discount_price=#{discountPrice}, introduction=#{introduction}, sort=#{sort} where id=#{id};
